item.title: Integrating emacs org-mode and google calendar
item.description: I am an EMACS user and consequently I use the amazing Org mode to plan my schedule and to manage my projects. However I was boring about how I synchronized the .ics file from EMACS and my Google calendar. I spent some minutes in my Google calendar to clear the appointments, and import a new file. So, a while ago I improved my routine. I did know nothing about it.
